typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceNo as integer '######',
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer '######',
		InvoiceDate as timestamp 'MM-dd-yyyy HH:mm',
		UnitPrice as double '######.##',
		CustomerID as integer '######',
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> IncoucesCountrysource
source(output(
		CountryId as integer,
		CountryCd as string,
		Country as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CountrySource
IncoucesCountrysource, CountrySource lookup(IncoucesCountrysource@Country == CountrySource@Country,
	multiple: false,
	pickup: 'any',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> CountryLookup
CountryLookup sink(input(
		InvoiceId as integer,
		InvoiceNo as integer,
		StockCode as string,
		Description as string,
		Quantity as integer,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		UnitPrice as decimal(10,2),
		CustomerID as integer,
		CountryCd as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	preSQLs:['Delete from customer_invoices'],
	mapColumn(
		InvoiceNo,
		StockCode,
		Description,
		Quantity,
		InvoiceDate,
		UnitPrice,
		CustomerID,
		CountryCd
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> InvoicesCountrySink
